SELECT SCRAP_ID, B.BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, SCRAP_REGISTER_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, SCRAP_ID, B.BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, SCRAP_REGISTER_DATE FROM ( SELECT SCRAP_ID, B.BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, SCRAP_REGISTER_DATE FROM TBL_SCRAP S JOIN TBL_BOARD B ON S.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY SCRAP_ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * 10 ) WHERE R > (#{page}-1) * 10
